value.title: Exclusive documents show which Pence aides are still getting government paychecks
value.excerpt: The documents show how Pence has been spending taxpayer cash since leaving the White House in January.

value.title: Mike Pence: Evidence 'strongly suggests' COVID-19 came from a Chinese lab
value.excerpt: Ex-VP Mike Pence points to a Chinese lab as COVID's source, but doesn't elaborate on the evidence he's citing. In a new paper, virologists disagree.

value.title: Pence calls on Biden to demand Olympics move out of Beijing until China offers transparency on COVID-19
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence called on President Biden to demand the 2022 Olympics be moved out of Beijing unless China offers transparency on the origins of COVID-19 and ends human rights abuses against the county's Muslim minority populations in Xinjiang.

value.title: Mike Pence Says China Seizing on Biden Admin 'Weakness' to Become 'Evil Empire'
value.excerpt: Pence called America's return to the WHO under Biden without "demanding a single concession" an example of the U.S. "rolling over to communist China."

value.title: Kinzinger: Pence & Republicans who turn against Trump are ‘out of the tribe’
value.excerpt: Rep. Adam Kinzinger (R-Ill.) talks to Chuck Todd about Republicans who distance themselves from Former President Donald Trump and their standing in the Republican Party.

value.title: 'Mr. Pence lost it': New book details VP's fight with Trump
value.excerpt: Contributing columnist to The Washington Post George Conway reacts to a new book detailing a tense exchange between Donald Trump and Mike Pence.

value.title: Mike Pence reportedly once 'lost it' after Trump threw a crumpled newspaper article at him
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence reportedly "lost it" and "snarled" at former President Donald Trump in 2018 after getting a crumpled up newspaper article thrown at him. At the time, Pence's political committee had just hired Trump's adviser Corey Lewandowski,

value.title: Pence's Contortions; Reexamining Laffer; Remote Workers
value.excerpt: Good morning, its Tuesday, July 6, 2021. President Biden will speak later today about the nations progress in administering COVID vaccinations.

value.title: Mike Pence Twists Into a Painful, Pointless Pretzel
value.excerpt: Mention that Mike Pence is trying to run for president in 2024 and people laugh  out loud. But he is. Even more hilarious is that the former vice

value.title: Pence was more worried about COVID-19 privately than in his public appearances and was 'rattled' by his press secretary contracting the virus: book
value.excerpt: According to the book "Nightmare Scenario," a close advisor's infection gave Pence "a firsthand glimpse at how quickly the disease could spread."

value.title: Pence rebukes Trump and says he was ‘proud’ to certify election result
value.excerpt: Former vice-president says he did his duty and takes aim at effort to overturn Biden victory, without mentioning Trump by name

value.title: Mike Pence Says 'Notion' One Person Could Choose U.S. President is 'Un-American'
value.excerpt: In remarks delivered at the Ronald Reagan Presidential Library, Pence addressed critics who blame him for Trump's loss to current President Joe Biden,

value.title: Mike Pence Brands Critical Race Theory 'State-Sanctioned Racism'
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence has called for the elimination of critical race theory during a speech in which he outlined his vision for the future of the Republican Party. Pence said on Thursday that the GOP "must stop the efforts to rewrite American history through initiatives like the 1619 Project ,

value.title: Pence sees GOP as 'last line of defense' for Constitution
value.excerpt: Vice President Mike Pence is accusing Democrats of trying to rewrite the Constitution and urging Republicans to build the party’s future around a defense of the nation’s founding documents, a robust m

value.title: Pence contradicts Trump on January 6, calling plan to decertify 2020 election 'un-American'
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence rebuked former President Donald Trump on Thursday night on the question of overturning the results of the 2020 presidential election.

value.title: Pence said he's 'proud' Congress certified Biden's win on Jan. 6
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence reiterated at a speech at the Reagan Library on Thursday he did not have the constitutional authority to stop the count of the electoral votes on Jan. 6.

value.title: Unholy post-Trump trinity: Bannon, Pompeo and Pence
value.excerpt: Catering to the white evangelicals and other conservative Christians may be good politics, but the approach Pence, Pompeo and other prominent Trumpites such as Steve Bannon take t

value.title: GOP in flux, Mike Pence plans speech at Reagan Library in Simi Valley
value.excerpt: The former vice president was once a GOP presidential frontrunner. But after Jan. 6 and slammed by Trump, it’s an uphill climb as he considers the presidency.

value.title: Mike Pence 'Not a Traitor' Says Kevin McCarthy, 'Stood Right by President Trump'
value.excerpt: Pence continues to face strong criticism from some supporters of former President Donald Trump for his role on January 6.

value.title: Pence met with jeers and called a "traitor" at Florida conservative conference
value.excerpt: When former Vice President Mike Pence took the stage in Florida to address a social conservative group, he was met with some jeers, and reporters in the room said some attendees called him a "traitor.

value.title: Pence called ‘traitor’ by hecklers at conservative Florida conference
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence was heckled during his remarks at the Faith & Freedom Coalition’s annual gathering in Florida.

value.title: Pence criticizes Harris over declining to visit US-Mexico border
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence took aim at his successor on Friday at a conference for religious conservatives in Florida, criticizing Vice President Kamala Harris for declining to visit the US-Mexico border during a recent immigration-focused trip to Central America.

value.title: Mike Pence Tells Kamala Harris 'It's Time' to Visit Southern Border
value.excerpt: Donald Trump's former VP criticized Harris while tweeting images of him visiting the border during his time in the office.

value.title: Mike Pence, Wife Buy Suburban Indianapolis Home for $1.93M
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence and his wife have purchased a $1.93 million suburban Indianapolis house that sits on a 5-acre spread and features seven bedrooms, a swimming pool and an indoor basketball court.

value.title: Mike Pence has sold out | PennLive letters
value.excerpt: Pence is willing to forgive and forget despite Trump’s stunning disloyalty because he has designs on being elected president in 2024 or 2028.

value.title: Pence to headline two events in Iowa, fueling 2024 run speculation
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence is set to headline two events next month in Iowa, the first state to host a primary for presidential elections, further fueling speculation that the former VP is mulling a run in 2024.

value.title: Mike Pence to appear at 'Feenstra Family Picnic' event July 16 in Sioux Center
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence is headlining Rep. Randy Feenstra's inaugural "Feenstra Family Picnic" next month in Sioux Center.

value.title: Pence to visit Iowa to headline event for congressman
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence will headline a fundraiser next month for Rep. Randy Feenstra (R-Iowa), marking his third trip in recent weeks to an early primary state and fueling speculation about his 2024 plans.

value.title: How Mike Pence's new Carmel home compares to the last one he owned
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence and his wife Karen have improved their position in life since they last owned a home in Indiana in 2013. The Pences bought a modest home in Columbus in 2001 for about $116,

value.title: Mike Pence buys $1.9M Indiana home packed with amenities
value.excerpt: The former Vice President and his wife Karen, have put their Washington D.C. days behind them and are now living in a $1.93 million Indiana home they purchased last month.
